venue.name: American Bistro in the Cambridge Marriott

item.description:
This will be the very first Meetup for The Boston Meetup Organizer Meetup Group!

And we'll kick things off with a special guest: Scott Heiferman, CEO and co-founder from Meetup. Scott is coming to Boston to get together with local Meetup Organizers and Assistant Organizers. Bring yourself -- and some ideas on how to kick start the Organizer community in Boston.

We'll use the time to get to know each other, talk about being Meetup Organizers, and discuss what we want out of our Meetups and this group.

for directions to the restaurant visit:
http://marriott.com/p...
item.name: the September Boston Organizer Meetup
